aom.scripting.ui.console

Class Terrain

  • Object
    • Terrain

  • public class Terrain
extends Object
    This class provides a collection of Console commands concerning Terrains, Areas and related tools.
    Author:
    Mythic_Freak - mythic.freak[a]gmail.com
    Local Call
    Terrain commands are all local.
    Editor Mode Only
    Terrain commands all require Editor Mode.
